entities
Class Item

java.lang.Object
  entities.Item

public class Item
extends Object

This class is part of the "Go Sunset" application. "Go Sunset" is a very simple, text based adventure game This class holds information about an in game item. An item currently consists of a weight and a name.

Version:
2014/02/23
Author:
Louis Capitanchik, Joshua Mulcock, Alice Charterton, John Stones

Constructor Summary
Item(float weight, String name)
          Creates a new Item instance with the given name and weight.
 
Method Summary
 String getName()
          Gets the name of the item
 float getWeight()
          Gets the weight of the item
 void printImage()
          Prints the image associated with this item to stdout
 
Methods inherited from class
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Item

public Item(float weight,
            String name)
Creates a new Item instance with the given name and weight. The name is tightly coupled to an image and they must match exactly if they are to be linked

Parameters:
weight - The weight of the item in units
name - The name of the item

                throws FileNotFoundException
